question: Display duty-free shops and souvenir stores in terminal 3.
sql_query1:
SELECT DutyFreeShops.name
FROM DutyFreeShops
WHERE DutyFreeShops.Location = "Terminal 3"
UNION
SELECT SouvenirStores.name
FROM SouvenirStores
WHERE SouvenirStores.Location = "Terminal 3"
sql_query2:
SELECT DutyFreeShops.name
FROM DutyFreeShops
UNION
SELECT SouvenirStores.name
FROM SouvenirStores
WHERE SouvenirStores.Location = "Terminal 3"
interpretation1: What duty-free shops and souvenir stores are in Terminal 3?
interpretation2: List all duty-free shops and also show souvenir stores in terminal 3.
